before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"duh5f","text":"Clean and prepare the laminar flow cabinet, turn on the water bath and warm up the culture media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8uf8a","text":"CMT-93 is a cell line exhibiting epithelial morphology that was isolated from the rectum of a mouse with polyploid carcinoma. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mauu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"f5qho","text":"Working with cell cultures requires a laminar flow cabinet. It has to be radiated with UV light, cleaned with any highly effective terminal disinfectant (such as Tego‱ 2000 or Suredis‱) and 70% ethanol. All material introduced into the cabinet must also be sprayed with ethanol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":166,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":183,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fktqg","text":"Once the work is finished, we must clean the cabinet with the detergent, then with 70% etOH and turn on the UV light for 30 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"DC27FA77EB5F11EE82B00A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"DC27FA77EB5F11EE82B00A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ffk26","text":"Add   of Trypsin-EDTA solution to flask and incubate   at   to facilitate detachment from the plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4vhg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mi17","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"96uei","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":14,"offset":19,"style":"bold"}],"key":"f1vma","text":"To avoid clumping, do not agitate the cells by hitting or shaking the flask while waiting for the cells to detach.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
